item.name: [170004600FGA]PRO_ACG_17_FGA_ACG_046_0709JLU10
item.description: Check the presence of alerts for FGA

exec: tests["Check FGA Alertes in Alertes"] = sqlResult[i].results[0].COUNT == "1";

item.name: [170004601]PRO_ACG_17_PCE_ACG_046
item.description:
Check the presence of PCE alerts :
-PCE M J should not hve alerts
-PCE with type point 500, 703 should not have alerts
-PCE with source_acquisition 8, T should not have alerts

exec: tests["Check PCE M J in Alertes"] = sqlResult[i].results[0].COUNT == "0";
tests["Check PCE Type Point in Alertes"] = sqlResult[i].results[0].COUNT == "0";
tests["Check PCE Source Acquisition in Alertes"] = sqlResult[i].results[0].COUNT == "0";
tests["Check PCE T and E in Alertes"]=true;
tests["Check PCE T and E in Alertes"]=false;
tests["Check PCE T and E in Alertes"]=false;
